text: The West was robbed of knowing these people as well as it does other K-pop bands. That's how I felt when I first heard them a few months ago because of the great magnitude of their talent. I'm Gen-X old, love all kinds of music, and they have become one of my favorite acts - ever. And when I see these various K-pop "lists" without them (idols who are actors, best dancer, best looking, highest notes, etc.), it's really disappointing and mind-boggling how the world works.

author: @liza_pet
text:
EXO is a diamond not only of SM but of the 
entire K-POP industry. I sincerely apologize, but the visual effects of EXO are too powerful, as soon as they appear on the stage, they capture you with their dazzle, not letting you go until the very end. It's been a whole 10 years, but they simply have no equal in live performances.

author: @liza_pet
text: EXO is my very first and only favorite band in the entire industry. It doesn't matter how many more years pass, EXO were, are and will be Kings of K-POP, Kings of Vocals, Legends and Discoverers of the 3rd generation. EXO, even after 10 years of career, are the most popular, sought-after and highly paid SM group. Yes, because they are their best band in the history of the company. EXO is the only band with such a variety of high-quality music, choreography and visual effects.

author: @liza_pet
text:
EXO is my very first and only 
favorite band in the entire industry.
EXO is not just my only love "all these 
boys are so dear to me as a family".
